creator: Safe Tech
descriptionHtml:
Stop worrying about your safety and check Civi to see what’s actually happening around you.

See what’s happening around you and get real-time safety alerts to help avoid potentially dangerous situations. View updated local news and events, and help protect your community by sharing alerts when you see something happening. Civi is always free to use.

Safety map: View your location on a map and see what events are happening around you in real time.

Real time safety alerts: Receive free alerts of safety and other events happening around you.

Earn rewards by keeping your community safe: Report safety events to help keep your community safe and alert your neighbors when they could be in danger. Earn rewards for reporting alerts and redeem rewards for coffee and snacks, cell phone credit, and ride-hailing app credits, and more.


Remember, Civi is not a substitute for emergency services. If you are in danger or you see someone in danger, you should always call the police and/or emergency services first.
descriptionShort: Stay safe and informed with real time alerts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improvements to understand app usability

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Do you want to stay connected to what happens in other neighborhoods?

Now you can follow districts to receive notifications and be the first to know about events around the city!

Civi, when intelligence and security go together.

title: Civi

creator: Safe Tech
descriptionHtml:
Who hasn’t felt unsafe in the streets of São Paulo at some point? Download the Civi App and receive free security information wherever you are. Plan the safest route before leaving home and receive real-time security alerts of relevant events around you, like crimes, protests and natural disasters.

With the Civi App you can:
- Navigate through the map to stay updated about security events near you, including detailed descriptions, images and videos.
- Receive real-time security alerts about nearby events, like protests, fires and robberies, thus preventing putting yourself at risk.
- Submit incidents directly through the App, keeping your community always protected and informed.
- Access up-to-date information about COVID-19 vaccination stations, like location, working hours, available vaccine types and waiting lines, saving you time and avoiding crowds.

Important: all events and information are validated by the Civi team.

The Civi App is 100% free! #SaferTogether
descriptionShort: Stay safer and better informed with Civi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Do you want to stay connected to what happens in other neighborhoods?
Now you can follow districts to receive notifications and be the first to know about events around the city!

Also, we fixed some bugs that were hindering new users to create their accounts.

Civi, when intelligence and security go together.

descriptionShort: Stay safer and better informed with Civi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Did you know that Civi also values your security within the app?

This update comes to fix small bugs and increase the security of your data as there is a lot of cool stuff out there.
Oh, and we improved performance on low-power devices!

Civil, when intelligence and security go together.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We now have comments on events! Thus, it is possible to include information and collaborate with the safety of other users.
In addition, you can block a profile and report comments to maintain your security and privacy. Check the rules on our website (https://www.civiapp.co/moderacao-conteudo).

We've also improved interaction with the reactions function on events, so you have a more fluid experience.

Civi, when intelligence and security go hand in hand.

descriptionShort: Stay safer and better informed with Civi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Agora ficou ainda mais fácil encontrar os eventos relevantes para você!

Adicionamos filtros na listagem de eventos do mapa para visualizar os mais próximos à sua localização ou apenas os que aconteceram nas regiões que você segue.
Além disso, agora o Civi App conta com uma aba exclusiva para eventos destaque: fique por dentro dos principais acontecimentos da cidade de São Paulo.

Civi, quando inteligência e segurança andam juntas.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Convide amigos a baixar a Civi e empodere a sua comunidade!
Agora é possível indicar a Civi para seus amigos e familiares e ganhar recompensas por isso! Confira o nosso programa de indicações diretamente pelo app.
Nessa versão, adicionamos melhorias no campo de pesquisa e no mapa de eventos. Melhoramos também a visualização de imagens e o mapa na tela de detalhe do evento.
Civi, quando inteligência e segurança andam juntas.

Gostou do app? Ficaremos muito felizes com sua avaliação! Ela nos ajuda a melhorar o app da Civi cada vez mais.
Dúvidas? Toque em "Fale com a Civi" no app, ou entre em www.civiapp.co e escreva para a gente!

Civi, inteligência e segurança andando juntas.

title: Civi: Safety information in real-time

creator: Safe Tech
descriptionHtml:
Would you like to stay informed about what is happening in your neighborhood in São Paulo capital? Download the Civi App to always stay up to date on events near you. Access real-time information on events around you, free of charge, in one place, such as crimes, demonstrations and natural accidents.

With the Civi App you can:
- Browse the map to keep up to date on security events around you, including detailed descriptions, images and videos.
- Receive real-time alerts about events near you, such as demonstrations, fires and trawls, thus avoiding risky situations.
- Report incidents directly through the App, keeping your community always protected and informed.
Important: all information is verified by the Civi team.
The Civi App is 100% free! Only in São Paulo capital.
descriptionShort: You always up to date in SP

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Confira algumas melhorias dessa última versão:

Sabia que é possível ver eventos somente de uma região? Basta procurar na barra de pesquisa e clicar em alguma região.
Além de ver o que mais importa pra você, é possível favoritar e receber notificações em tempo real!

Dúvidas? Toque em "Fale com a Civi" no app, ou entre em www.civiapp.co e escreva para a gente!

Civi, inteligência e segurança andando juntas.

- Melhorias de usabilidade e navegação e correção de bugs.

Gostou do app? Ficaremos muito felizes com sua avaliação!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Agora é possível salvar os seus lugares favoritos através da barra de pesquisa. Você pode salvar sua casa, trabalho ou qualquer outro endereço e receber notificações em tempo real sobre tudo que acontece nas proximidades! Além disso, um atalho será criado para você não precisar pesquisar novamente.
Esse evento é útil? Todos os eventos agora contam com uma votação para que você diga se ele é útil ou não. Assim, a Civi conseguirá mostrar os eventos mais relevantes e que te deixam mais seguro.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Confira algumas melhorias dessa última versão:

Agora temos uma aba de notificações no app para você sempre ter acesso a todos os últimos eventos enviados pela Civi.

Dúvidas? Toque em "Fale com a Civi" no app, ou entre em www.civiapp.co e escreva para a gente!

Civi, inteligência e segurança andando juntas.

title: Civi: Security and Information

creator: Safe Tech
descriptionHtml:
Would you like to stay informed about what is happening in your neighborhood in São Paulo capital? Download the Civi App to always stay up to date on events near you. Access real-time information on events around you, free of charge, in one place, such as crimes, demonstrations and natural accidents.

With the Civi App you can:
- Browse the map to keep up to date on security events around you, including detailed descriptions, images and videos.
- Receive real-time alerts about events near you, such as demonstrations, fires and trawls, thus avoiding risky situations.
- Report incidents directly through the App, keeping your community always protected and informed.
Important: all information is verified by the Civi team.
The Civi App is 100% free! Only in São Paulo capital.
descriptionShort: You always up to date in SP

Dúvidas? Toque em “Fale com a Civi” no aplicativo, ou entre em www.civiapp.co e escreva para a gente!

title: Civi: Security and Information

creator: Safe Tech
descriptionHtml:
Would you like to stay informed about what is happening in your neighborhood in São Paulo capital? Download the Civi App to always stay up to date on events near you. Access real-time information on events around you, free of charge, in one place, such as crimes, demonstrations and natural accidents.

With the Civi App you can:
- Browse the map to keep up to date on security events around you, including detailed descriptions, images and videos.
- Receive real-time alerts about events near you, such as demonstrations, fires and trawls, thus avoiding risky situations.
- Report incidents directly through the App, keeping your community always protected and informed.
Important: all information is verified by the Civi team.
The Civi App is 100% free! Only in São Paulo capital.
descriptionShort: You always up to date in SP

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Correções de bugs e melhorias de performance.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Já conhece a Civiana? Ela pode te ajudar a entender melhor algumas funcionalidades da Civi!
- Localize familiares e amigos
- Alertas em tempo real
- Nível de bateria
- Avisos de chegada e saída
- Histórico de localização

Dúvidas? Toque em "Fale com a Civi" no aplicativo, ou entre em www.civiapp.co e escreva para a gente!

title: Civi: Security and Information
